title: How much Attack Speed does Yasuo need to reach full CDR on Q?

replies.body: if you have static shiv anywhere past 16 you are already at full CDR for Q
Not much, only 1.4 AS I believe. After around 1.2 it's not very significant.
So how much bonus attack speed as a percentage?

Depends on your level, because AS per level is a thing.

though according to the wiki it requires 110% bonus attack speed (not sure if that counts the per level bonuses or not.)
